Containers.Name: pacvert
Containers.Description: Simple automated way for users to convert new content[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where the pacvert configuration and library files will reside[br][br] Don't forget to enter in the host port and the config folder location. [br][br] [span style='color: #E80000;']8181[/span] is the WebUI port
Containers.Overview: Simple automated way for users to convert new content
